synonym.mean: 地位；状态；情形；重要身分

word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指周围的情况或某事发生时的情况。
指一个人在政治、社会、经济、法律上的地位或身份，暗含地位显要意味。也可用于指政治等事态的状况。
一般强调产生影响的原因或环境，复数形式指笼统的情况。
普通用词，指人或物在环境、外表、心灵以及健康方面的状况，或指在某一阶段的状态或形式。
指明确具体的环境情况或处境。

word_group.brief_definition: 法律地位；合法地位；法定地位
现在的状态；当前状态；目前地位
研究现状；研究状况；研究的现状
难民地位；难民身份；难民的地位
营养状况；营养状态；营养情况
政治地位；政治现状；政治状况
现状报告；状态报告；情况报告
财务状况；财务状态；财政地位
相同的地位；相同的状态

bilingual.source: His status in the team is crucial.
bilingual.target: 他在团队中的地位很重要。
他们的经济地位有所改善。

bilingual.source: His status in the company is very high.
bilingual.target: 他在公司里的地位很高。

bilingual.source: The new policy has a quasi-official status.
bilingual.target: 新政策具有类似的官方地位。

bilingual.source: This follower has a low status in the gang.
bilingual.target: 这个马仔在帮派中地位不高。
这个奖项提升了他的职业地位。

bilingual.source: Her social status gives her many privileges.
bilingual.target: 她的社会地位让她有很多特权。

bilingual.source: Kobe holds a high status in the basketball world.
bilingual.target: 科比在篮球界有着很高的地位。

bilingual.source: These concubines held high status in the court.
bilingual.target: 这些妃嫔在宫廷中有很高的地位。

list.abstract: status（英 [ˈsteɪtəs]，美 [ˈsteɪtəs]），英语单词，作名词为相对社会地位；相对身份；情形等。短语搭配有social status（社会地位），例句有An individual's financial status was often underestimated.（个人的财务状况经常被低估。） status相关近义词有capacity、ranking。

yingyinNormal.en: And isn't it true that in addition to your Ground Floor status, you are a moderator on this site? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么根据你一楼楼主的地位，你是否也是这个网站的网管？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: And in recognition of the extraordinary service they have demonstrated the legal status of superheroes is hereby restored.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鉴于超级英雄们所做出的突出贡献他们的合法地位即刻起恢复。

yingyinNormal.en: Unless he takes Bernadette's last name. And considering her advanced status, that could open some doors for him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非他能随伯纳黛特的姓，考虑到伯纳黛特的地位更高，这么做未尝不可。

yingyinNormal.en: What bargain? You're Jenny Humphrey from Brooklyn. You need status, access, resources. I give that to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么交易？你是布鲁克林的珍妮·汉弗瑞，你需要的是地位，渠道，资本，我可以给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Because it's got bravado. It's social status. No, you know what? It's even more than that. It's social currency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这让他们感觉到他们是前卫的，这也是他们社会地位的一种认可。你们知道么？更进一步说它代表了一种社会文化

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes, of course I remember you. A woman well past her prime seeking to augment her social status by doling out her late husband's ill-gotten gains.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我当然记得，你一个通过把死去丈夫得来的不义之财都捐赠出去以提高自己的社会地位的女人。

yingyinNormal.en: The status quo is not an option. Not anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 维持现状不是一个办法，不再会是。

yingyinNormal.en: What's his relationship status?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的情感生活是个什么状态？

yingyinNormal.en: Then why did she change her Facebook status? She probably didn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那她为什么换了Facebook的状态？她应该没有吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Amy, I noticed your status still says "In a relationship" on Facebook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾米，我注意到你脸书的状态还是"恋爱中"。

yingyinNormal.en: So what's going on with you two? Well, the status is as it always was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们俩最近如何？状态一直维持不变。

yingyinNormal.en: They're not fond of rules, and they have no respect for the status quo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不喜欢规则，他们不满足于现状。

yingyinNormal.en: What's your status? My chest hurts. I have broken my ribs. How are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你状况如何？我胸口好疼，可能肋骨断了，你怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: Not one pic of kitty, not even a status update saying, "we found our cat."
yingyinNormal.zh: 她一张猫咪的照片都没发过，甚至不会更新这样的状态说"我们的猫找到了"。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you single? I don't have a marital status, if that's what you're asking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你现在是单身吗？如果你是问婚姻状况的话，我没有这个属性。

yingyinNormal.en: They're pushing me out. Cary, that little gerbil, told me to take emeritus status.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们要逼我走，凯里那小婊砸，居然让我退休。

yingyinNormal.en: They can't be doing that. They did. They lowered my security status to a red badge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们不能这么做。但他们确实做了，他们把我的安全级别降到红色。

yingyinNormal.en: Boy, we've got to get you into a better office. Something more suited to your status.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子，我们真该给你换个好点的办公室，能配得上你的名气。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at her status update. She's saying she dumped me. People need to know I dumped her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看她的状态更新了，她说她把我甩了，大家需要知道是我甩了她。

yingyinNormal.en: But what if it has no legal status? I don't want to build her hopes up only to have them dashed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果这不合法呢？我不想给她希望又让她失望。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the social or professional position of someone or something in relation to others; high rank or social standing

examination_example.sentence: His father was a clerk in the British Navy pay office — a respectable position, but with little social <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父亲是英国海军出纳室的职员——一个体面的职位，但没有什么社会地位。

examination_example.sentence: His paternal grandparents, a steward and a housekeeper, possessed even less <highlight>status</highlight>, having been servants, and Dickens later concealed their background.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的祖父母，一个是男管家，一个是女管家，地位更加低微，都做过仆人，后来狄更斯隐瞒了他们的背景。

examination_example.sentence: However, the Justices said that Arizona police would be allowed to verify the legal <highlight>status</highlight> of people who come in contact with law enforcement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，大法官们表示，将允许亚利桑那州警方核实接触执法的人的合法身份。

sense_info_list.en: the position of affairs at a particular time, especially in political or commercial contexts

examination_example.sentence: Interest groups exert self-interested pressure on Congress insisting that whatever else happens to the Postal Service, aspects of the <highlight>status</highlight> quo they depend on get protected.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利益团体为了自己的利益向国会施加压力，他们坚持认为，无论美国邮政管理局发生什么事情，他们所依靠的现状的各个方面都必须得到保护。

examination_example.sentence: They could cement the <highlight>status</highlight> quo of peer-reviewed research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们会僵化同行评价型研究的现状。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the social or professional position of someone or something in relation to others; high rank or social standing

examination_example.sentence: In conversation, people have to carefully consider their <highlight>status</highlight> and appearance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在交谈中，人们必须仔细考虑他们的地位和外表。

sense_info_list.en: the position of affairs at a particular time, especially in political or commercial contexts

examination_example.sentence: An individual's financial <highlight>status</highlight> was often underestimated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 个人的财务状况经常被低估。

examination_example.sentence: Nationality is less useful than socio-economic <highlight>status</highlight> as an indicator of one's values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为个人价值观的指标，国籍不如社会经济状况有用。

examination_example.sentence: Occupation and socio-economic <highlight>status</highlight> were the most strongly correlated, suggesting that our values are more economically driven than we usually think.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 职业和社会经济状况的关联性最强，这表明我们的价值观比我们通常认为的更受经济驱动。

sense_info_list.en: the level of importance that is given to something

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the social or professional position of someone or something in relation to others; high rank or social standing

examination_example.sentence: It may get in the way of enhancing one's social <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能会妨碍人提高自己的社会地位。

examination_example.sentence: The city regains its <highlight>status</highlight> as a place where even poor kids can access the resources to succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座城市恢复了它的地位，成为一个连穷孩子都能获得成功资源的地方。

examination_example.sentence: They are closely related to people's social <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们与人们的社会地位密切相关。

sense_info_list.en: the position of affairs at a particular time; especially in political or commercial contexts

examination_example.sentence: In addition, trends in both employment <highlight>status</highlight> and wages have likely contributed to the growing share of young adults who are living in the home of their parent (s) , and this is especially true of young men.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，就业状况和工资的趋势可能也是导致住在父母家里的年轻人的比例不断增加的原因，这一点在年轻男性中尤其如此。

examination_example.sentence: It is the characteristics of the specific environment they are in—how healthy they feel they are, their age and marital <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是他们所处的特定环境的特征，包括他们感觉自己的健康程度、年龄和婚姻状况。

examination_example.sentence: What matters most was the residents' physical health and mental <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 居民的身体健康和精神状况是最重要的。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指世袭的、军队的、社会的阶级。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the social or professional position of someone or something in relation to others; high rank or social standing

examination_example.sentence: It clearly showed that while likability can lead to healthy adjustment, high <highlight>status</highlight> has just the opposite effect on us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这清楚地表明，讨人喜欢可以带给我们良好的适应能力，而高地位对我们的影响恰恰相反。

examination_example.sentence: The global black rhino population has dropped as low as 5500, giving the rhinos a "critically endangered" <highlight>status</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球黑犀牛的数量已经下降到5500头，这使得犀牛处于“极度濒危”的状态。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the social or professional position of someone or something in relation to others; high rank or social standing

examination_example.sentence: His <highlight>status</highlight> is not only an artist but also an inventor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的身份不仅是艺术家，也是发明家。
